name: Barn Orchestra
description:
In Barn Orchestra you play as Benny Jay, who's setting up his annual barn orchestra, i.e. a bunch of screaming animals in a barn. He's also making his famous rabbit stew at the same time as he's trying to keep the bonfire lit. However, on the day of the event, he discovered not only that his animals have escaped, but there's a shortage of firewood, and the ingredients for the rabbit stew are missing.

Step into the shoes of Benny Jay as you try to save an event that's on the brink of failure.

Controls

  • Use W, A, S, D to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Right mouse button to check wristwatch
  • Left mouse to grab items, release to drop them
  • E to enter and exit your truck
  • Space to use handbrake in your truck
  • Hold R to restart the game
  • Hold Escape to quit the game

Acknowledgements

Credit goes to Will Reierson for the voice recordings of the radio host and the shop keeper.
